name: Slack Day
shortDescription: A fun, simple stress-control game — test how long you can stay relaxed while avoiding stressful objects!
fullDescription:
Slack Day is a lighthearted arcade game about stress management. Tap to jump, dodge stress, and keep your health bar from draining. But beware — even simple actions can wear you out!

Stay calm, stay lazy, and see if you're a true slacker.
